name: entityRoleCode
description: Code identifying the role of the entity. For example, MF. Each entity role code can only be transmitted once per PGA line.

name: entityIdentificationCode
description: Code identifying the Entity Identification. For example: 16 (DUNS #), 47 (FEI#). Mandatory, if Entity Number is entered.

name: entityNumber
description: Identifying Number (DUNS or FEI) for the associated Entity Identification Code. Mandatory if Entity Identification Code is provided

name: entityName
description: The name of the entity is required. If Entity Name requires additional space, continue in a PG60 record with Qualifier Code “ENA”. Refer to validation criteria below.

name: entityAddress1
description: The address of the entity is required. If Entity Address1 requires additional space, continue in a PG60 record with Qualifier Code “AD1”.
